structure.unit: ESCAPES, FUGITIVES FROM JUSTICE, AND EXTRADITION

law.catch_line: Capture and return of fugitive from house of reform.

text.section: The officer of a house of reform and any peace officer or citizen may arrest, without warrant, and return to the institution, any child who escapes from a house of reform or home in which an inmate has been placed on parole.
A peace officer shall arrest any child known by him to have escaped from a house of reform, and return him to the institution.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2095b-12, 2095b-15, 2095b-31.
